review: I thought that Netflix had the market cornered on free home movie viewing, but Amazon Fire TV is the new leader in my house.  I thoroughly enjoy the amount of available movies by genre and I can put the ones I find on-line in my WatchList!  Absolutely recommend that all who have Prime membership enjoy this to the fullest and take advantage of what Amazon offers...Never been more happy with the amount of choices...Thank you Amazon!
